doc:
Simon Gillis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Gillis 0 Simon Peter Gillis (April 6, 1875 – January 14, 1964) was an American track and field athlete, a member of the New York Athletic Club, and the New York City Police Department. He was one of a group of athletes known as the Irish Whales and frequently kept company with members of the Irish American Athletic Club. He competed in weight throwing events in the 1904, 1908 and 1912 Summer Olympics. Simon_Peter_Gillis ( April_6_,_1875 – January_14_,_1964 ) was an_American_track_and_field_athlete , a_member of the_New_York_Athletic_Club , and the_New_York_City_Police_Department . He was one of a_group of athletes known as the_Irish_Whales and frequently kept company with members of the_Irish_American_Athletic_Club . He competed in weight throwing events in the_1904_,_1908_and_1912_Summer_Olympics .
